semantics.label: Round settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the rounds behave.

fields.label: Number of correct images per round
Mode for choosing images
fields.description: Choose whether images will be returned to the pool of images to choose from. Please note that your requested number of (correct) images per round may not be possible if you set the mode to "sampling without replacement".

fields.label: Score in a round can be negative
Give one point for the whole question
Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Mode for overall scoring
fields.description: "Total score" will sum up scores of all rounds. "One point total" will award 1 point if all rounds were fully correct, 0 otherwise. "Custom" allows to define a score based on score ranges.

fields.label: Define custom absolute scores for any total score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% 1, 21-91% 2, 91-100% 3

fields.label: Enable "Retry"
fields.description: This option will be available after completing all rounds, not after each round.

fields.label: Enable "Solution"
fields.description: This option will be available after completing all rounds, not after each round.

fields.label: Text for round announcer
fields.description: @current is a placeholder and will be replaced by the actual value.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "score" announcements
fields.description: @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Previous round" button
Assistive technology description for "Previous round" button when not available
Assistive technology description for "Next round" button
Assistive technology description for "Next round" button when not available
